title: Some Idiot “Accidentally” Scheduled Abbie’s Interview On Nova At The Same As Matt’s
text:
Nova? Smallzy? Fitzy & Wippa? Channel 10? What, and I can’t express this enough, the shit? Following last night’s finale, brand new Bachie couple Matt Agnew and Chelsie McLeod and runner-up Abbie Chatfield set out on their obligatory press tour. And somehow all three of them ended up just metres away from each other, in opposite studios at Nova HQ. And apparently, it was just an accident. Yeah, cool. Funny.

Nova host Smallzy posted a video of the “accidental encounter” on Twitter, captioning it: “Sometimes awkward run-ins happen.”

And look, you can piss right off with that. A lot of planning goes into press tours – things like this don’t just “accidentally” happen. And even if it was an accident, both stations were more than happy to turn its interview into an ‘Oh, my God, turn around and look who’s in the other booth. HahHAhahhh, how awkward!’

Despite insisting that she was fine, Abbie was obviously not – you can see it on her face. Who the fuck enjoys running into their ex? No one does. NO ONE. And love Abbie or hate her, this is just awful and unnecessary.

“I don’t want to weird you out right now but they [Matt and Chelsie] are in that studio over there,” Smallzy tells Abbie.

“Holy shit,” she says.

“That is the most horrible thing I have ever experienced in my life,” she adds.

Sometimes awkward run-ins happen ???? Abbie had an accidental encounter with Matt and Chelsie today at Nova… ???? #TheBachelorAU @fitzyandwippa pic.twitter.com/V3jzbAsM98 — Smallzy ???? (@Smallzy) September 20, 2019

Gross.

And believe it or not, that wasn’t even the worst thing that happened during today’s The Bachelor press tour. Kyle Sandilands decided to ask Matt and Chelsie about their sex life and then proceeded to pass those details on to – you guessed it – Abbie. Get fucked, mate. Just get fucked.
description: 'Bachie' couple Matt Agnew and Chelsie McLeod and runner-up Abbie Chatfield "accidentally" ended up just metres away from each other at Nova HQ.
